item.title: WAN Topology Options
item.description: Businesses have various choices for connecting their branch offices, franchisees, suppliers, customers, and remote employees. The ideal network structure depends on the specific goals, whether it’s basic off-site backups or creating a virtual company spanning multiple states. Let’s explore some prevalent WAN topologies used today. The most widespread WAN is the Internet, connecting almost everyone everywhere. It’s a massive mesh network with affordable connections available through various methods like wireline, wireless, and fiber optic.
